title: Efficient Bit Manipulation for Odd-Even Swap
description: In computer science, bitwise operations are used to manipulate individual bits of a binary number. One common problem is to swap the odd and even bits of a positive integer. This can be achieved with as few operations as possible using bitwise operators.
